;===============================================================
;== TRIGGER DATA STARTS HERE ==
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_ICE_Trigger_Initialize1
  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  100
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  100
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_ICE_Trigger_Initialize2
  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  100
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_ICE000
  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

  Condition Trait NaturalIntelligence < 3
        and Trait NaturalCharisma < 3
        and Trait NaturalEnergy < 3

  Affects ICERating  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_ICE001
  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

  Condition Trait NaturalIntelligence < 3
        and Trait NaturalCharisma < 3
        and Trait NaturalEnergy > 2

  Affects ICERating  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_ICE010
  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

  Condition Trait NaturalIntelligence < 3
        and Trait NaturalCharisma > 2
        and Trait NaturalEnergy < 3

  Affects ICERating  3  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_ICE011
  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

  Condition Trait NaturalIntelligence < 3
        and Trait NaturalCharisma > 2
        and Trait NaturalEnergy > 2

  Affects ICERating  4  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_ICE100
  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

  Condition Trait NaturalIntelligence > 2
        and Trait NaturalCharisma < 3
        and Trait NaturalEnergy < 3

  Affects ICERating  5  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

        and Trait NaturalCharisma < 3
        and Trait NaturalEnergy > 2

        and Trait NaturalCharisma > 2
        and Trait NaturalEnergy > 2

  ;------------------------------------------
Trigger worthy_of_adoption_1_ICE_Trigger_Initialize1
  WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  100
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  100
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  100
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------

  WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50

  ;------------------------------------------
 Trigger Uninitialized_Intelligence
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

  Condition Trait NaturalIntelligence < 1
        and AgentType = family

  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  100
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Charisma
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

  Condition Trait NaturalCharisma < 1
        and AgentType = family

  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  100
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Energy
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

  Condition Trait NaturalEnergy < 1
        and AgentType = family

  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  100
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50
  Affects NaturalEnergy  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_ICE000
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

  Condition Trait NaturalIntelligence < 3
        and Trait NaturalCharisma < 3
        and Trait NaturalEnergy < 3
        and Trait ICERating < 1
        and AgentType = family

  Affects ICERating  1  Chance  100

        and Trait NaturalCharisma < 3
        and Trait NaturalEnergy > 2
        and Trait ICERating < 1
        and AgentType = family

  Affects ICERating  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition I_TurnNumber < 1
	      and AgentType = family
		  and CharacterReligion pagan

    Affects LoyaltyStarter  1  Chance  100 
    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  65
    Affects BoringSpeaker  1  Chance  5 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  65 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition I_TurnNumber < 1
	      and AgentType = family
		  and CharacterReligion pagan

	Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  65 
	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  65 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  65 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  65
	Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  20
	Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  20 
	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  20 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  20 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  20
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized1_a
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition I_TurnNumber < 1
	      and AgentType = family
		  and CharacterReligion catholic

    Affects LoyaltyStarter  1  Chance  100 
    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  60
    Affects BoringSpeaker  1  Chance  5 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  60 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition I_TurnNumber < 1
	      and AgentType = family
		  and CharacterReligion catholic

	Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  60 
	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  60 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  60

	Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  20

Trigger fixed_birth1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CharacterReligion pagan

    Affects LoyaltyStarter  1  Chance  100 
    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  45
    Affects BoringSpeaker  1  Chance  5 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  45 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fixed_birth2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CharacterReligion pagan

	Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  45 
	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  45 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  45 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  45
	Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  20
	Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  20 
	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  20 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  20 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  20

	Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  20 
	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  20 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  20 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  20	
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger fixed_birth1_f
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CharacterReligion heretic
		  
    Affects LoyaltyStarter  1  Chance  100 
    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  25
    Affects BoringSpeaker  1  Chance  10 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fixed_birth2_f
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CharacterReligion heretic
		  
	Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  25 
	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  25 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  25 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  25
	Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  20
	Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  20 
	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  20 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  20 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0090_Standard_Battle_Any_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = family
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 2.25

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  80 
	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  25 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  25 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  25 
	 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0100_Standard_Battle_Any_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = family
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds > 0.66

    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  50 
	Affects StrategicSkill  -1  Chance  50 
	Affects TacticalSkill  -1  Chance  50 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  -1  Chance  50 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger governing12
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = family
          and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_happy
          and TimeInRegion > 3

    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  5 
	
	;------------------------------------------
Trigger governing16
    WhenToTest GovernorCityRiots

    Condition GovernorTaxLevel > tax_low

    Affects BadAdministrator  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governing17
    WhenToTest GovernorCityRebels

    Condition GovernorTaxLevel > tax_low

    Affects BadAdministrator  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle5
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = family
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and not Trait InspiringSpeaker > 0

    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle6
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = family
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and Trait InspiringSpeaker > 0

    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger selfperpetuating10
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BoringSpeaker >= 1

    Affects BoringSpeaker  1  Chance  4
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger selfperpetuating11
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait PoliticsSkill >= 1

    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  4 	
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger governing13
    WhenToTest GovernorCityRiots

    Affects Rabblerouser  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governing14
    WhenToTest GovernorCityRebels

    Affects Rabblerouser  1  Chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_with_academia
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition AgentType = family
          and FactionBuildingExists = alchemists_lab

    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  50
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  50 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  50 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_with_alchemy_school
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition AgentType = family
          and FactionBuildingExists = alchemy_school

    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  70
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  70 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_with_university
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition AgentType = family
          and FactionBuildingExists = university

    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  90
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  90 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  90 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_with_military_academy
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition AgentType = family
          and FactionBuildingExists = military_academy

	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  30 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  30 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_with_officers_academy
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition AgentType = family
          and FactionBuildingExists = officers_academy 

	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  50 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  50 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  50 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_academia1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = alchemists_lab

    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  5
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  5 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  5
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_academia2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = alchemy_school

    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  10
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  10 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  10
	
	;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_academia3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = university

    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  15
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  15 	
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_military_academy1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = military_academy

	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  5 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  5 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_military_academy2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = officers_academy 

	Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  10 
	Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  10 
	Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents18
    WhenToTest BriberyMission

    Condition MissionSucceeded

    Affects GoodDiplomat  1  Chance  60 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents27
    WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

    Condition MissionSucceeded

    Affects GoodDiplomat  1  Chance  50
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents19
    WhenToTest BriberyMission

    Condition not MissionSucceeded

    Affects BadDiplomat  1  Chance  40 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents28
    WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

    Condition not MissionSucceeded

    Affects BadDiplomat  1  Chance  30
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger agent63
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and DistanceCapital >= 60

    Affects Multilingual  1  Chance  10 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger selfperpetuating50
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ReligiousTolerance >= 1

    Affects ReligiousTolerance  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomatinit9
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition not AtSea
          and AgentType = diplomat
          and PopulationOwnReligion <= 70

    Affects ReligiousTolerance  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomatinit10
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition Trait ReligiousTolerance >= 1

    Affects ReligiousTolerance  1  Chance  25 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger selfperpetuating49
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ReligiousIntolerance >= 1

    Affects ReligiousIntolerance  1  Chance  4 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomatinit7
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition not AtSea
          and AgentType = diplomat
          and PopulationOwnReligion >= 80

    Affects ReligiousIntolerance  1  Chance  50 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomatinit1
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = diplomat

    Affects GoodDiplomat  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomatinit2
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and Trait GoodDiplomat = 1

    Affects GoodDiplomat  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger diplomatinit3
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and Trait GoodDiplomat = 2

    Affects GoodDiplomat  1  Chance  20 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomatinit8
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition Trait ReligiousIntolerance >= 1

    Affects ReligiousIntolerance  1  Chance  25 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit1
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = spy

    Affects NaturalSpySkill  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit2
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = spy
          and Trait NaturalSpySkill = 1

    Affects NaturalSpySkill  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit3
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = spy
          and Trait NaturalSpySkill = 2

    Affects NaturalSpySkill  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger agents1
    WhenToTest SpyMission

    Condition MissionSuccessLevel = not_successful

    Affects BadSpy  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents2
    WhenToTest SpyMission

    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and Trait GoodSpy = 0

    Affects GoodSpy  1  Chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents3
    WhenToTest SpyMission

    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and Trait GoodSpy > 0

    Affects GoodSpy  1  Chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiral1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 2.25

    Affects Sailor  1  Chance  55 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents30
    WhenToTest AcquisitionMission

    Condition MissionSucceeded

    Affects GoodMerchant  1  Chance  60

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents31
    WhenToTest AcquisitionMission

    Condition not MissionSucceeded

    Affects BadMerchant  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------

Trigger merchantinit1
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = merchant

    Affects NaturalMerchantSkill  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger merchantinit2
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and Trait NaturalMerchantSkill = 1

    Affects NaturalMerchantSkill  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger merchantinit3
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and Trait NaturalMerchantSkill >= 2

    Affects NaturalMerchantSkill  1  Chance  33 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents33
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and TradingMonopoly

    Affects Monopolist  1  Chance  75

;------------------------------------------
Trigger merchantinit5
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= town_hall

    Affects ShadyDealer  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger merchantinit6
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and Trait ShadyDealer = 1

    Affects ShadyDealer  2  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger merchantinit7
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= council_chambers

    Affects LegalDealer  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger merchantinit9
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= council_chambers
          and Trait LegalDealer = 1

    Affects LegalDealer  1  Chance  33
